project_description: The Traffic Management System is a cutting-edge technology solution designed to optimize traffic flow, reduce congestion, and enhance overall transportation efficiency. Its primary purpose is to provide real-time monitoring, analysis, and control of traffic conditions, enabling swift decision-making and proactive management. Key features of the system include intelligent signal control, real-time traffic updates, incident management, and data analytics. The intended users of this system are urban planners, transportation agencies, and traffic management authorities, who can leverage its capabilities to improve commute times, reduce accidents, and create a more sustainable and livable urban environment. By streamlining traffic operations and minimizing travel times, the Traffic Management System aims to benefit the broader community, including commuters, businesses, and emergency services, ultimately contributing to a smoother, safer, and more efficient transportation network.

entities.entity_description: Represents a user of the Traffic Management System, including urban planners, transportation agencies, and traffic management authorities.
Represents a traffic signal, including its location, status, and control settings.
Represents a real-time traffic update, including traffic conditions, incidents, and road closures.
Represents a traffic incident, including its location, type, and status.
Represents data analytics and insights generated by the Traffic Management System.
